New @AFP with @AnujChopra:

Hundreds of AI-powered sites mimicking news outlets have cropped up in recent months, fueling an explosion of false narratives that researchers say is stoking alarm in a year of high-stake elections around the world.https://t.co/ptjBITIOkF
